meanings.definition: In a manner characteristic of adolescence.
meanings.sent1: She giggled adolescently at the silly joke.
meanings.sent2: He behaved adolescently by rolling his eyes at his parents.
meanings.sent3: The puppy barked adolescently at its own reflection.
meanings.sent4: The flowers swayed adolescently in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The car horn honked adolescently in the distance.
